languages.text: "Страж Патента?" {n}Абеляр переводит взгляд на сервочереп, кружащий около вас.{/n} "Лорд-капитан практически никогда не спускалась в Камеру... и я присутствовал в этот момент с ней всего пару раз, и ни разу не видел ничего подобного".

traits.locale_text: "Страж Патента?" {n}Абеляр переводит взгляд на сервочереп, кружащий около вас.{/n} "Лорд-капитан практически никогда не спускалась в Камеру... и я присутствовал в этот момент с ней всего пару раз, и ни разу не видел ничего подобного".

languages.text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."
languages.original_text: "Страж Патента?" {n}Абеляр переводит взгляд на сервочереп, кружащий около вас.{/n} "Лорд-капитан практически никогда не спускалась в Камеру... и я присутствовал в этот момент с ней всего пару раз, и ни разу не видел ничего подобного".

traits.locale_text: "The Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever goes down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

"The Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever goes down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

"Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

"Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

"Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

languages.text: “守护授状的哨兵？”{n}他看着漂浮在你身旁的伺服头骨。{/n}“舰长大人几乎从来都没去过授状大厅……有那么一两次，她去那里的时候，我也一同前往，但当时并没有发生类似的情况。”
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: “守护许可证的哨兵？”{n}他看着漂浮在你身旁的伺服头骨。{/n}“舰长大人几乎从来都没去过许可证大厅……有那么一两次，她去那里的时候，我也一同前往，但当时并没有发生类似的情况。”

languages.text: «¿El centinela de la Patente?». {n}Observa el servocráneo que flota junto a ti.{/n} «La Lord Capitán no se adentra en la sala prácticamente nunca... solo la acompañé una o dos veces cuando lo hizo, y en ninguna ocasión vi nada similar».
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: «¿El centinela de la Patente?». {n}Observa el servocráneo que flota junto a ti.{/n} «La Lord Capitán no se adentra en la sala prácticamente nunca... solo la acompañé una o dos veces cuando lo hizo, y en ninguna ocasión vi nada similar».

languages.text: 「令状のセンチネルが？」{n}彼はあなたのすぐそばを漂っているサーヴォスカルに目をやる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは滅多にその部屋に足を運びません…そして我は1、2度だけロード・キャプテンにお供して部屋に行きましたが、そのようなものを見た覚えはありません」
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: 「センチネル令状？」{n}彼はあなたのすぐそばを漂っているサーヴォスカルに目をやる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンが部屋に行くことはめったにありません…そして私は1、2度ロードキャプテンにお供して部屋に行きましたが、そのようなものは何も見ませんでした」
「令状のセンチネルが？」{n}彼はあなたのすぐそばを漂っているサーヴォスカルに目をやる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンは滅多にその部屋に足を運びません…そして我は1、2度だけロード・キャプテンにお供して部屋に行きましたが、そのようなものを見た覚えはありません」

languages.text: « La sentinelle de la lettre de marque ? {n}demande-t-il en regardant le servocrâne qui flotte près de vous.{/n} La seigneure-capitaine ne se rend que ponctuellement dans la salle... mais je l'y ai accompagnée une ou deux fois et je n'ai rien vu de la sorte. »
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: « La sentinelle de la lettre de marque ? {n}demande-t-il en regardant le servocrâne qui flotte près de vous.{/n} La seigneure-capitaine ne se rend que ponctuellement dans la salle... mais je l'y ai accompagnée une ou deux fois et je n'ai rien vu de la sorte. »

languages.text: "Handelsbriefwächter?" {n}Er betrachtet den Servoschädel, der neben dir schwebt.{/n} "Der Lord Captain geht nur selten hinunter zur Kammer ... und ich habe sie nur ein- oder zweimal dabei begleitet und habe nichts dergleichen dort gesehen."
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: "Handelsbriefwächter?" {n}Er betrachtet den Servoschädel, der neben dir schwebt.{/n} "Der Lord Captain geht nur selten hinunter zur Kammer ... und ich habe sie nur ein- oder zweimal dabei begleitet und habe nichts dergleichen dort gesehen."

languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

languages.text: "Ruhsatname Nöbetçisi mi?" {n}Yanı başında süzülen hizmelete bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Oda'ya çok nadiren uğrar ve bir iki ziyaretinde kendisine eşlik ettim ama hiç böyle bir şeye denk gelmedim."
languages.original_text: "Warrant Sentinel?" {n}He looks at the servo-skull floating next to you.{/n} "The Lord Captain barely ever ventures down to the Chamber... and I was at her side only once or twice when she did, and I did not see anything of the sort."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhsatname Nöbetçisi mi?" {n}Yanı başında süzülen hizmelete bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Oda'ya çok nadiren uğrar ve bir iki ziyaretinde kendisine eşlik ettim ama hiç böyle bir şeye denk gelmedim."
